body_html: I was able to solve this issue by deleting this line. Obviously this doesn't work on systems without NNPACK. The issue is that ATen first builds this library, and then the NNPack CMakeLists finds it again and links it seperately.
body_text: I was able to solve this issue by deleting this line. Obviously this doesn't work on systems without NNPACK. The issue is that ATen first builds this library, and then the NNPack CMakeLists finds it again and links it seperately.
body: I was able to solve this issue by deleting [this line](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/aten/src/ATen/CMakeLists.txt#L325). Obviously this doesn't work on systems without NNPACK. The issue is that ATen first builds this library, and then the NNPack CMakeLists finds it again and links it seperately.
